overlay_content: This research presents DWAEF, a novel sarcasm detection approach combining simile detection (GNN), metaphor analysis (BERT embeddings), and tonal shifts (fuzzy logic). It achieved 92% accuracy on a self-curated dataset, outperforming traditional methods and showcasing the power of advanced linguistic indicators in deep learning.

A Python library designed to streamline the transition from raw data to machine learning models. veda_lib automates and simplifies data preprocessing, cleaning, and balancing, addressing the time-consuming and complex aspects of these tasks to provide clean, ready-to-use data for your models.
Designed and developed a dynamic website tailored for both regular and premium users, offering a seamless experience in meditation and mindfulness.

Conducted sentiment analysis on a self-annotated dataset of over 10,000 tweets using TF-IDF vectorization and Support Vector Machines (SVM). Achieved an accuracy rate of 89%. This project demonstrates proficiency in natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning techniques.

Designed and implemented an interactive quiz application using core Java concepts to enhance user engagement and knowledge retention. The app features a user-friendly interface, dynamic question flow, and performance tracking, providing an engaging learning experience. This project demonstrates proficiency in Java programming and application development.

Developed a Python script using Selenium to automate code submissions on Codeforces, ensuring users' streaks remain intact even if submissions are missed. The script maintains consistency in coding practice by automating routine tasks, streamlining the user experience. This project highlights expertise in Python, Selenium, and web automation.
